quarantineItemsIds.description: The list of IDs for the quarantined items. You can restore maximum 100 items once.

locationToRestore.description: [Optional] The absolute path to the folder where the items will be restored. If the parameter is not set, the original location will be used.

addExclusionInPolicy.description: [Optional] If set to True, the restored items will be added to the exclusion list in the policy. Default is False.

result.description: This method returns a Boolean which is True if the operation was successful.
